group_1.textRight: Because my wish…
was to "form a band of warriors led@by my sister."

group_1.textLeft: Why would you wish for that?!

group_1.textRight: You have this wonderful dream…
And my dream is to help you achieve it…
I've told you that many times, haven't I?
That's why I was going to wish for that at first.
But then I thought, would you really be happy@if it came true? I mean…
If you didn't work hard to achieve your dream,@then it wouldn't be as fulfilling…
That's why I stopped and made@a different wish…

group_1.textLeft: You wished to form a warrior band?@And make me the leader…?

group_1.textRight: To achieve one's dreams, a person has@to be free, first and foremost…
And you'll need to have an organization and@groundwork if you want to travel the world…
I didn't want to make your dreams come true@out of the blue…
So I wished for you to be in the position@to start heading towards that goal.
The day after I made that wish, those strange@things happened to us.
That's when I knew for sure…@My wish had been granted.

group_1.textLeft: …You absolute IDIOT!@How could you be so selfish?!

group_1.textRight: …I'm sorry…

group_1.textLeft: Y-you! When you become a Magical Girl…
You have to fight, don't you?!@Fight…those Witches!
I'm not going to let you do this all by yourself!

group_1.textRight: It's okay, Olga. Your dream is my―
Are you referring to me?

group_1.textLeft: Make me a Magical Girl too!
I'll never allow my dream to come true@at Gunhild's expense!

group_1.textRight: You can't!
I can't allow you to do that,@even if you are my own sister!
I won't let you become a Magical Girl…@Never!
